blog.name: why-i-love-comics
blog.title: A blog dedicated to all your favorite moments
blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)

summary: Captain Marvel rabbiosa in una nuova fantastica fan-art di Bosslogic
title: Captain Marvel rabbiosa in una nuova fantastica fan-art di Bosslogic
body:
Captain Marvel rabbiosa in una nuova fantastica fan-art di Bosslogic

Dopo gli eventi di Avengers: Infinity War non aspettiamo altro che Avengers 4 arrivi e ci mostri quello che tutti ci aspettiamo di vedere, i Vendicatori uniti ancora una volta assieme alla potentissima Captain Marvel, nella lotta contro… non sappiamo bene cosa. Forse il riportare gli amici alla vita?

La cosa che a noi però preme di più è proprio vedere questo nuovo personaggio, interpretato dalla…

View On WordPress

summary: SHAZAM! #1 written by GEOFF JOHNS art and cover by DALE EAGLESHAM backup story art by SEN variant cover by GARY FRANK blank...
caption:
SHAZAM! #1

written by GEOFF JOHNS
art and cover by DALE EAGLESHAM
backup story art by SEN
variant cover by GARY FRANK
blank variant cover available
The superstar team of writer Geoff Johns and artist Dale Eaglesham reunite to launch the first all-new SHAZAM! monthly title set in the DC Universe in almost 20 years! (What took you guys so long?!)
Teenager turned super-hero Billy Batson struggles to balance school and superheroics! (Guess which one is more fun?) But when Shazam unlocks a shocking secret deep within the Rock of Eternity, it challenges everything he knows about the worlds of magic and his family’s future as its champions! Also, witness the bizarre team-up of Dr. Sivana and Mr. Mind as they set off to build a society all their own! Don’t miss the start of an epic run in the making as “Shazam and the Seven Realms” begins!
ON SALE 11.21.18
$4.99 US | 40 PAGES | FC
RATED T
This issue will ship with two covers.
Please see the order form for details.
Includes a code for a free digital download of this issue.

blog.name: blanddcheadcanons
blog.title: Bland DC Headcanons
blog.description: Welcome to Bland DC Comics Headcanons. This is where you can find every boring, dull, and ordinary headcanon about your favorite DC superheroes. Does Aquaman eat beef? Does Superman have a terrible singing voice? What this blog needs are your boring thoughts about DC Comics. If you have a bland headcanon, check out the rules and then send it.

blog.name: stevenrogers5
blog.title: MARVEL
blog.description: I write Peter, Bucky, and Steve stuff! | Send me anything| Master List

title: WRITING UPDATES
body:
Truth or maybe i never have: I am going to write till part 10 then i am going to end the series. 

Oh. Y/N: The concept was great, but i just can’t find the inspiration to properly execute it. So i am no longer continuing that series. 

I am going to be starting a new Sebastian Stan and Tom Holland Series based off the 1920′s. It will be one series with the both of them! 

I’m mostly writing small writings for Steve and Chris currently. 

Message me if you have any requests or would love to be added to perm tag list!!

summary: Я все-таки начал читать The Monster Society fo Evil. Качество в основном просто чудовищное - варьируется от ужасного до...
caption: Я все-таки начал читать The Monster Society fo Evil. Качество в основном просто чудовищное - варьируется от ужасного до кошмарного (хотя несколько номеров вроде как есть приличного качества). Не знаю, как я все это читать буду, потому что я и на первом номере уже все глаза себе сломал. А все из-за тебя, DC! Не хотят они, видите ли, отреставрированную версию издавать… А я теперь мучайся, блин.
